FAQs

Q1. Why dogBARC?
Answer 1: Because all dogs can be trained - young and old. Computerized training produces the best long-term results - for dog and owner. Calming, mental stimulation for your dog. Medication-Free for Life!
Q2. What is the dogBARC method?
Answer 2: Firmly in the camp of positive reinforcement training, dogBARC is rooted in science. We have more than 50 years of scientific practice in our founding team. dogBARC technology reliably stimulates and calms your dog - providing a lifetime feeding and training buddy for when your dog should be resting happy in the family home.
Q3. Will technology affect my relationship with my dog?
Answer 3: dogBARC technology fixes critical destructive behaviors within the family home. By removing worrying and frustrating behaviors, dogBARC frees you up to fully enjoy and interact with your dog.
